entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
